item.title: How I Installed Cosmic DE on Arch Linux
item.description:
Introduction

I installed Sway at first, but after some recommendations from my community, I decided to install Cosmic.

First steps:

When I removed sway, I did it without disabling autostart in my bash_profile. This caused me to not be able to log in to my user; which, is not fine since I want to build packages!

To fix this, I went to my Home folder in my Root user, entered my user’s home folder, and commented out the sway startup script, rebooted, and now I have a blank TTY screen.
